text: The following is a list of games that have been announced for release on Microsoft's Xbox home video game console family including the Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S. Both are scheduled for release on November 10, 2020. The Xbox Series X and Series S have full backward compatibility with Xbox One games as well as several Xbox 360 and original Xbox games that were supported on the Xbox One, excluding those that used Kinect. This list also includes Xbox One games that have been or will be released with special enhanced versions optimized for the Xbox Series X and Series S. These may be through Microsoft's "Smart Delivery" program that allows a player to purchase the game one for either platform, through an additional patch or update from the Xbox One version for the Xbox Series X and Series S, or as a separate standalone Xbox Series X and Series S title. Developers can also target for an "Optimized for Xbox Series X/S" branding, indicating that the game takes advantage of one or more of the next-generation features on the console, though the exact requirements to use this labeling are not specified by Microsoft.
